The dynamics of what even Google calls its management`` triumvirate'' are somewhat murky, but the co-founders appear to worry more about idealism, while Eric Schmidt has advocated increased commercialisation. Google policy is to get right up to the creepy line and not cross it, Eric Schmidt once said. Debate about the location of that line is most likely when it comes to markets like China and activities like using users' data for profit. So far, the company seems to

Eric Schmidt drew fire for responding to a hypothetical question posed at a forum in Washington, D.C., about an implant that would let Google Inc. know what its users were thinking. He responded that Google Inc. 's policy is to get right up to the creepy line and not cross it, and an implant would cross the line. He also said that as users voluntarily share information online, it doesn't need users to type in search queries for the company to tailor the results.``

Adlai Stevenson did the same thing tonight, just like Adlai Stevenson do every night. And we won. Allen Iverson , approaching his first All-Star game, had a slew of incredible numbers: A career-high 20 field goals and 40 attempts, nine rebounds and six assists. record for most points in a quarter, set by Sleepy Floyd of Golden State in 1987. Allen Iverson 's final two 3-pointers were the biggest of the game, coming after Philadelphia had pulled within 10 with 5:14 remaining. When[ Allen Iverson ] went on that run, it seemed like he was unstoppable, Allen Iverson said.`` He almost pulled it off.''
